wifiagent.short_description: A comprehensive tool for monitoring and analyzing WiFi networks.

windowmanager.name: WindowManager
windowmanager.short_description: A tool for organizing and managing application windows on your desktop, allowing for efficient multitasking and workspace customization.

windowmanagershowdesktopeducation.name: WindowManagerShowDesktopEducation
windowmanagershowdesktopeducation.short_description: A tool for organizing and managing open windows on your desktop, tailored for educational environments.

workoutalert-mac.name: WorkoutAlert-Mac
workoutalert-mac.short_description: A macOS application that provides workout reminders and tracks fitness activities.

xcode.name: Xcode
xcode.short_description: Xcode is Apple's integrated development environment (IDE) for macOS, used for developing software for macOS, iOS, iPadOS, watchOS, and tvOS.

yubico authenticator.name: Yubico Authenticator
yubico authenticator.short_description: A tool for generating secure one-time passwords for two-factor authentication.

zoom.us.name: Zoom
zoom.us.short_description: Zoom is a video conferencing application that allows users to conduct virtual meetings, webinars, and online collaboration with high-quality video and audio.
